input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration entry defined in a configuration module.
Example: BCAN

String Value - The task id number
Example: TAS000000000157

XML document containing configuration item information to be related to a given task.
Example:
<Configuration-Items> <Configuration-Item> <name></name> <instance-id></instance-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name></name> <instance-id></instance-id> </Configuration-Item> </Configuration-Items>

String Value - The change id number
Example: CRQ000000000157

String Value - The source of the workflow calling Create Task Relationships"
Example:
Close Task
Create Task
Update Task
SNMP TRAP

output.description:
XML output with task detail
Example: <Tasks> <Task> <job-id /> <task-id>TAS000000000135</task-id> <status>Staged</status> <change-id>CRQ000000000151</change-id> <comments>Install Software</comments> <url /> <logs>***** This is a sample notes entry *****</logs> </Task> </Tasks>

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: 0-success,1-failure

String Value - Verbose success status message
Example: The retrieval of Task data has completed successfully for TAS000000000135

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">('10006803' = "${task id}") and ('1000000206' = "${configuration item name}")</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: Task relationships did not require updating.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <configuration-item> <name> <xsl:value-of select="//configuration-item/name/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> <instance-id> <xsl:value-of select="//configuration-item/instance-id/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </instance-id> </configuration-item> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <tasks> <task> <task-id>${task id}</task-id> <change-id>${change id}</change-id> <configuration-items> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()//configuration-items/*" /> ${configuration item} </configuration-items> </task> </tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: ***** Show Configuration Item Collection - here we are *******

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/Configuration-Items"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:for-each select="Configuration-Item"> <Configuration-Item> <name> <xsl:value-of select="name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> </Configuration-Item> </xsl:for-each> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/Configuration-Items"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:for-each select="Configuration-Item"> <Configuration-Item> <name> <xsl:value-of select="name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> </Configuration-Item> </xsl:for-each> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="//Tasks"> <configuration-item> <name> <xsl:value-of select="//description/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> </configuration-item> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <tasks> <task> <task-id>${task id}</task-id> <change-id>${change id}</change-id> <configuration-items> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()//configuration-items/*" /> ${configuration item} </configuration-items> </task> </tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: ***** Show Configuration Item Collection - Top Line *******

output.value: Deleted Configuration Item Name was successfully written to the Notes log.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="//Configuration-Item"> <configuration-item> <name> <xsl:value-of select="name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> <instance-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Unable to create relationship, CI Name written to Task Notes.</xsl:text> </instance-id> </configuration-item> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <tasks> <task> <task-id>${task id}</task-id> <change-id>${change id}</change-id> <configuration-items> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()//configuration-items/*" /> ${configuration item} </configuration-items> </task> </tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: ***** Show Configuration Item Collection - Top Line *******

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Nothing to delete for Task ID: ", .)

input.value: ***** Show Configuration Item Collection - Top Line *******

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Nothing to delete for Task ID: ", .)

input.value: ***** Show Configuration Item Collection - Top Line *******

output.value: The Configuration Items document was incorrectly formed.

documentation.description: This workflow updates an existing task with CI relationships, or if an unknown CI the task notes field .
